title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 131.6 - Presentation of the case of the office of unclaimed funds
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 2 ยง 131.6 - Presentation of the case of the office of unclaimed funds

State Regulations

Upon completion of the claimant/payee's case, the Office of

Unclaimed Funds shall have the opportunity to offer proofs in opposition to the
claimant/payee's case. The Office of Unclaimed Funds may call and examine any
and all witnesses on its behalf. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 2
ยง
131.6

Adopted, New

York State Register September 3, 2014/Volume XXXVI, Issue 35, eff. 9/3/2014

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
